title: Why don\'t drivers stop for people using the Ann St. crosswalk on South Third St.? Why don\'t the police enforce the NC state law requiring drivers to stop?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/06/why-dont-drivers-stop-for-people-using-the-ann-street-crosswalk-on-south-third-street/
